item.title: Markdown tables to Word tables `[WORK AROUND]`
item.description: Pandoc is an amazing document converter that I use very frequently. Earlier today, as I was converting a Markdown document (.md) to a Word one (.docx) I realized that the tables weren’t rendered properly. More precisely, after opening the document with LibreOffice, the first column of every tables was using the full width of the document and I was not able to quickly fix this issue with LibreOffice. I figured that this was caused by either pandoc or LibreOffice and so I first checked the version of pandoc installed:
